entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story. He is mentioned in the first line as '14 H ARRY  POTTER'.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a character who lives with Harry. He is described as having a 'furious face' when he appears at the foot of the stairs.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Uncle Vernon's son and Harry's cousin. He is mentioned wearing a bow-tie and dinner jacket.

relationships.description: Harry lives with Uncle Vernon, as they are both present in the same house.
Harry is Dudley's cousin, as they share a common relative (Uncle Vernon).
